channel.title: Make your private server original
channel.description:
[center]First thing to know: Try not to leech servers from the download section and renaming it, this is always the bad way to host a private server.
[i]Try to make your own base other than using someone else base. Starting fresh is always the good way to be original. [/i]
[i]Here are some idea's:
[ul][li]Try to make a private server like a upon a quest[/li] [li]Use mini-games of somesort, not always training or pking[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Make the server based on two choice, one evil or one good(clan battle)[/li][/ul]
[b][size=15pt]Folk's use my damn idea ! ! ! and try to make it original[/size][/b]
[quote="Syrillia"]Make people work for items like whips and godswords and phats. that keeps the economy up.[/quote]
If you have more original idea's post em here:[/center]

item.title: Make your private server original
item.dc:creator: @kando2 kando2
item.description:
@kando2 wrote:

Yes economy is always important,

Read full topic

item.title: Make your private server original
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

PKing is fun to an extent, after that’s it’s rubbish. I wonder how many people could make a server with no-pking? but still keep people entertained? Add games. Make people work for items like whips and godswords and phats. that keeps the economy up.

Read full topic

my bad! god dont get in my face man it is just my opinion!

kyledibiase <(-_-)>

Read full topic

item.title: Make your private server original
item.dc:creator: @kando2 kando2
item.description:
@kando2 wrote:

Syrillia:

Kando’s right. I little work can make it look super effective (and unrecognizable).

exactly, it’s always pking or skills.
I thought you guys quit runescape, thats why you came to moparscape
to have more fun and get those items that you can’t bother to get in runescape.

Read full topic

item.title: Make your private server original
item.dc:creator: @kando2 kando2
item.description:
@kando2 wrote:

[center]First thing to know: Try not to leech servers from the download section and renaming it, this is always the bad way to host a private server.

Try to make your own base other than using someone else base.
Starting fresh is always the good way to be original.

[i]Here are some idea’s:

[ul][li]Try to make a private server like a upon a quest[/li]
[li]Use mini-games of somesort, not always training or pking[/li][/ul]

[ul][li]Make the server based on two choice, one evil or one good(clan battle)[/li][/ul]

[size=15pt]Folk’s use my damn idea ! ! ! and try to make it original[/size]

Syrillia:

Make people work for items like whips and godswords and phats. that keeps the economy up.

If you have more original idea’s post em here:[/center]
